TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PeerApplicationRegistrationType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of registration to perform for a or registration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Registering an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> enables it to receive <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> invitation requests. The service or application performing the registration must have permission to do so, as it requires access to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> and other resources like users, applications, and services on the remote machine.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType AllUsers = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The or is being registered for all peers of the application host

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType CurrentUser = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The application or object is being registered only for the user associated with the calling peer
